2015 to April 2018 Work with developers and data architects to come up with scripts and testing Provide database security measures by creating and assigning appropriate roles and privileges to users Creating and maintaining primary database objects tables views indexes once developers have designed an application and assist developers in the design when required Generate object comparisons between databases Provide solutions and maintain the database for troubleshooting by using trace files and alert logs Daily incremental backup and weekly full backup of databases using RMAN Performing recovery on database using recovery manager Create indexes and and running scripts given by the clients Routine database clean ups removing old trace files archived logs Table space monitoring products Administer databases using SQL Server Management StudioSSMS Granting roles and privileges to end users Managing troubleshooting and resolving oracle database and application issues Education
